name: The Adventures of Robin Lloyd
description:
PlayStation Store Description (from Ad Blurbs)

To download content to the Memory Stick PRO Duo™ of your PSP® (PlayStation®Portable) system, the free space required is twice the size of the content to be downloaded.

This software is playable for PLAYSTATION®3 and PSP® (PlayStation®Portable).

To download this software, you must also have at least 90MB of free space on your PLAYSTATION®3 system's hard disk.
To play this software with your PSP®, the latest system software and a Memory Stick Duo™ with at least 90MB of free space are required.
For more detail information about download to your PSP® system, please see below URL.

http://asia.playstation.com

When downloading using PC:
When downloading contents to PSP®, you must install the PLAYSTATION®Network Downloader application first. Please go to our official website for installing instructions and other information.

??

?Game description
It starts with a strange incident in London. As the game's main character private detective Robin Lloyd, you must solve countless mysterious! A key element of this game is its investigation system that lets you study objects that rouse your suspicion by looking at them from below or behind and even turning them upside down at times, almost as if you had picked them up in your own hands. The truth behind the incident becomes clearer and clearer each time you investigate. But perhaps the biggest mystery is how Robin's adventure will end!

Supported Accessories: Wireless Controller (supports vibration feature??
?For vibration feature, the DUALSHOCK®3 Wireless Controller is required.

?PS3™ HDD and Memory Stick™ capacity requirement
90MB
